about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack for The Life of a Magical Circle, a free game about following your dreams. The main gameplay music tracks have been combined, remixed, and remastered exclusively for this soundtrack release. High quality WAV files are included.

The primary purpose of this soundtrack release is to offer fans a way to support the developer.
